item.title: Zapier
item.description: Zapier Zapier connects your apps and automates your workflows without any coding required. With over 6,000 app integrations, Zapier lets you create automated workflows (called “Zaps”) that handle repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters most. How it works: Trigger - Something happens in one app (new email, form submission, etc.) Action - Zapier automatically does something in another app Automation - It runs 24/7 without you having to think about it Popular use cases:
